item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello ! My name is Elies Tali, aka EyeXion, and this is my site ! Welcome ✨! Let's start with the basics. I am a 21 years old french Software & Network engineering student at the National Institute of Appilied Sciences of Toulouse (INSA). I love coding and my favorite fields are cybersecurity and video game developement. My dream would be to be able to work on projects that combine both fields.

item.title: Biparite matching for job distribution in Ocaml
item.description: With my lab partner we coded a job distribution algorith in Ocaml and to be honest I think it could actually be useful so I’m sharing it here !

item.title: Chat Desktop Application in Java
item.description: I coded a distibuted chat app in Java for one of my classes with a friend. I thought it would be cool to present our work here !

item.title: Web Game project in TypeScript
item.description: During the summer holidays, members of the IT Club of INSA Toulouse had the idea to create a new website for the club to attract new members. One of the main ideas was to organize a contest among students with a game we would create. Check it out !

item.title: Sailboat management system in C
item.description: With 3 of my classmates, we coded a sailboat management system in C on a STM32 µcontroller. I really liked working on that project, maybe I will want to go deeper in this field ?

item.title: Riot Summonner Info app in Python
item.description: I coded a small desktop app to get the info about a League of Legends player in Python.
